article: I went back to China as soon as school was over at the end of June. And I returned to Canada on August 17th. It's  _  to go back to China this summer, because of the A(H1N1)flu. Everybody seemed to be  _  . The easiest thing for us to do was to wear masks on the plane, as my mom suggested. However, it was not  _  to wear a mask for ten hours. I decided to put the masks into my bag  instead of  wearing them. Everything seemed OK  _  the flight. I saw only five people wear masks all the time. When we arrived in Beijing, some  _  came into the plane and took our temperature. Fortunately,  _  had a fever. Therefore, I was able to get home on time. However, everything went wrong after I got home. I became sick, with a sore throat and a fever because I had not  _  my mom's words. Luckily, I just had a common  _  . while I was sick in bed, I thought that if I had listened to my mom at first, I  _  would have never caught the cold. It's always wise to listen to your mom's suggestions.
